Class Question

java.lang.Object
application.obj.UserSubmission
application.obj.Question
public class Question extends UserSubmission
An object that represents a user-submitted question.

  • Constructor Summary

    • getAnswers

      public List<Answer> getAnswers()
      Gets an unmodifiable list of all marked answers to the question (may be empty).
      Returns:
      unmodifiable list of answer objects

    • addAnswers

      public boolean addAnswers(Answer... answers)
      Adds a particular answer to the question
      Parameters:
      answers - Answer(s) to add
      Returns:
      true if the answer(s) were added; false otherwise

    • getTags

      public List<String> getTags()
      Gets the tags of the question, for organizational and search functionality.

    • setTags

      public void setTags(List<String> tags)
      Sets the tags of the question.
      Parameters:
      tags - New tags

    • addTags

      public boolean addTags(String... tags)
      Adds tags to the question.
      Parameters:
      tags - Tag(s) to be added
      Returns:
      true if tag(s) were added; false otherwise

    • removeTags

      public boolean removeTags(String... tags)
      Removes particular tags from the question.
      Parameters:
      tags - Tag(s) to remove
      Returns:
      true if tags were found and removed; false otherwise

    • removeAllTags

      public void removeAllTags()
      Removes all tags from the question.
